thread.title: Florida woman films sex act video inside courthouse
thread.title_full: Florida woman films sex act video inside courthouse | Daily Mail Online

author: Emily Crane For Dailymail.com
title: Florida woman films sex act video inside courthouse
text:
A woman has filmed herself performing oral sex on a man inside a Florida courthouse before posting it on Twitter.
Police are investigating after Brittney Jones shared the video online on Tuesday of her at the Duval County Courthouse in Jacksonville where she was facing a judge on unrelated charges.
The 26-year-old, who has since deleted the footage from Twitter , had boasted about the explicit video on social media and joked that it was her way of trying to get her charges dropped.
Scroll down for video
Brittney Jones, 26, shared a video of herself performing a sex act on a man outside a courtroom in Jacksonville, Florida on Tuesday
She filmed herself scanning the empty corridor outside the courtroom before she performed the sex act on a man sitting on a bench.
'Had so much fun at court today. Found a way to get my charges dropped.... h don't tell,' she wrote on Twitter alongside the 34-second video.
Authorities said the shocking incident occurred during business hours at the court and security cameras recorded the sex act.
She was at the court to face charges of possession of drug paraphernalia, smuggling contraband into jail and violation of probation.
Jones was sentenced to time served and was fined after spending two days in prison in relation to those charges.
She filmed herself scanning the empty corridor outside a courtroom before she performed the sex act on a man sitting on a bench
Her father David told News4Jax that he wasn't ashamed of his daughter's action but he was disappointed.
He said it wasn't the first time she had posted sexually explicit content online and the family had been trying to get to stop for years.
A video of her performing a sex act on a man circulated on Facebook in 2015.
Jones' grandmother said the 26-year-old had a son.
'I would hate for him to turn on TV and see his mom. That's very very upsetting to me,' she said.
The Jacksonville Sheriff's Office is investigating the incident but it is unclear if Jones or the man will be charged.
According to her Twitter profile, Jones works as a stripper at Jacksonville Topless Bar Cocktails.
She has been vocal on Facebook since the video surfaced.
'To all the news channels following me on Facebook. I know for a fact your reading this, so I will let all of your know; I will only do a interview with the highest bidder. Shoot me a price,' she wrote on Thursday.
Jones was at the court to face charges of possession of drug paraphernalia, smuggling contraband into jail and violation of probation
Jones has been vocal on social media since the video she posted online went viral
